issue.title: [R] io "tell()" methods are inconsistently named and untested
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6449](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6449). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Looking in r/R/io.R, there is inconsistency as to whether the tell method of the various streams should be spelled "tell" or "Tell", and most are untested. Also, `[~pitrou]` asks, "is it necessary to redefine it [for all subclasses]? It should be inherited."

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6449?focusedCommentId=16924647) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This is being done in ARROW-5505.
